SMSmessages.contents: Dear Parent, you are invited for your child's Visitation Day at Mengo SS scheduled for the 16th October, 2024. Gates will open at 7:00am to 6:00pm. Please come visit your child and keep track of their academic performance. For more information, contact: DOS: +256755667788 or Deputy H/M: +25655335511 <Delivered by BulkSMS>
